item.description: You're invited to a free public screening of a new movie based on the book The Other Boleyn Girl. It will be February 27th at the Boston Common theater. Please don't forget to bring the invitation. I have posted the PDF version of the pass to the Files section of meetup.com for you to print at your convenience. Please email me if you cannot download the invitation.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: The Other Boleyn Girl free screening
